name: Grav Blazer Squared
description: Grav Blazer is an arcade space shooter with a focus on fast paced action. Players will experience procedurally generated levels with increasing difficulty. To beat a sector all space bases need to be defeated.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 + Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher Graphics: 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
